document.title: Hot Topic: Interest Rate Set at 12 Percent Effective July 1, 2006, on Delinquent Taxes Collected or Administered by the State of Tennessee
document.abstract: The rate of interest effective July 1, 2006, through June 30, 2007, has been set at 12 percent, which is an increase from last year.
